SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.strategy.firing

Class MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.strategy.firing.MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FiringStrategy
public class MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy extends Object implements FiringStrategy
The MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy class implements the FiringStrategy interface and defines the firing behavior for a multi-phase boss in a game. It uses a ProjectileFactory to create projectiles and an ActorSpawner to spawn them. The firing rate is determined by a specified fire rate.

    • MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy

      public MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy(ActorSpawner actorSpawner, double fireRate, double offsetX, double offsetY)
      Constructs a new MultiPhaseBossFiringStrategy with the specified actor spawner and fire rate.
      Parameters:
      actorSpawner - the actor spawner used to spawn actors
      fireRate - the rate at which the boss fires

  • Method Details

    • fire

      public void fire(FighterPlane plane, long now)
      Fires a projectile from the given fighter plane if the random condition based on fireRate is met. The projectile's initial position is determined by the plane's projectile position offsets. The projectile is then spawned using the actorSpawner.
      Specified by:
      fire in interface FiringStrategy
      Parameters:
      plane - the fighter plane from which the projectile is fired
      now - the current time in milliseconds
